description: All the data that is presented here is captured by the PromEx Oban plugin (https://github.com/akoutmos/prom_ex/blob/master/lib/prom_ex/plugins/oban.ex)

panels.description: The configuration of the selected Oban instance
panels.title: Oban Time Limit Settings

panels.description: The number of jobs in each queue that are in the available state.
panels.title: Available Jobs in Queue

panels.description: The configuration of the selected Oban instance
panels.title: Oban Configuration

panels.description: The configured concurrency limits for each of the queues under the Oban supervisor.
panels.title: Queue Concurrency Limits

panels.description: The number of jobs processed across all queues and states.
panels.title: Processed Jobs (by $interval interval)

panels.description: The number of jobs that resulted in an error across all queues.
panels.title: Job Errors (by $interval interval)

panels.description: The number of jobs that have been enqueued.
panels.title: Jobs Enqueued (by $interval interval)

panels.description: A heatmap showing the time it took to process jobs across all queues.
panels.title: Job Execution Time

panels.description: A heatmap showing how long jobs are waiting in queue for processing.
panels.title: Job Queue Time

panels.description: The average time it took to process jobs per queue. This will include jobs that ended with a successful, snoozed, or discarded state.
panels.title: Average Job Execution Time

panels.description: The average time a job waited in queue for processing.
panels.title: Average Job Queue Time

panels.description: The average time it took to process jobs per queue. This will include jobs that ended with a successful, snoozed, or discarded state.
panels.title: Average Job Attempts

panels.description: A heatmap showing the time it took to process jobs across all queues that resulted in an error.
panels.title: Job Execution Time

panels.description: A heatmap showing how long jobs are waiting in queue for processing that resulted in an error.
panels.title: Job Queue Time

panels.description: The average time it took to process jobs per queue that resulted in an error.
panels.title: Average Job Execution Time

panels.description: The average time a job waited in queue for processing prior to resulting in an error.
panels.title: Average Job Queue Time

panels.description: The average time it took to process jobs per queue that resulted in an error.
panels.title: Average Job Failure Attempts

panels.description: The number of jobs marked as available in each queue.
panels.title: Available Jobs per Queue

panels.description: The number of jobs marked as completed in each queue.
panels.title: Completed Jobs per Queue

panels.description: The number of jobs marked as executing in each queue.
panels.title: Executing Jobs per Queue

panels.description: The number of jobs marked as retryable in each queue.
panels.title: Retryable Jobs per Queue

panels.description: A heatmap showing how long jobs to be dispatched.
panels.title: Producer Dispatch Time

panels.description: A heatmap showing the number of jobs that were dispatched.
panels.title: Producer Dispatch Count

panels.description: The average amount of time it took to dispatch jobs to each queue.
panels.title: Average Dispatch Time

panels.description: The average number of jobs dispatched to each queue.
panels.title: Average Dispatch Count

panels.description: The average amount of time it took to encounter an encounter an error.
panels.title: Average Exception Duration

panels.description: This is the total number of trip events that have been encountered by the selected application and Oban instances.
panels.title: Circuit Trip Events (last 1 hour)

panels.description: This is the total number of trip events that have been encountered by the selected application and Oban instances.
panels.title: Total Circuit Trip Events

panels.description: This is the total number of open events that have been encountered by the selected application and Oban instances.
panels.title: Circuit Open Events (last 1 hour)

panels.description: This is the total number of open events that have been encountered by the selected application and Oban instances.
panels.title: Total Circuit Open Events

panels.description: The number of circuit breaker trip events that occurred along with what component tripped the breaker.
panels.title: Circuit Breaker Trip Events

panels.description: The number of circuit breaker open events that occurred along with what component tripped the breaker.
panels.title: Circuit Breaker Open Events

title: Pinchflat - PromEx Oban Dashboard
